name: Noah's Descent into Madness
description:
Noah's Descent into Madness is a short horror-themed adventure and puzzle game. Make your way through a dark forest of unknown horrors while trying your best to escape the nightmare you've found yourself in.

The story so far...

After traversing through a strange dimension, Noah found himself trapped in a seemingly abandoned mansion. By using his wits, he was able to navigate through the puzzle-locked mansion to reach the basement, hoping he would find his escape there. What met him instead was a demon, taunting him by throwing further puzzles and combat challenges his way.

By boldly navigating the traps and freeing his friends along the way, Noah and his party took on the demon in its own dimension. With the power of friendship, the demon was defeated, and the way out cleared. Despite his friends mysteriously disappearing after the fight, Noah was determined to leave the mansion and stepped outside into what he thought was finally his freedom…
